text.author: The Nobz
text.title: CHAMPIONS LEAGUE SEMI-FINAL!!! FIFA 20 AC MILAN CAREER MODE #16
text.summary1: (human1) This episode features three games towards winning the Scudetto, where the player wins a simulated game against Benevento 3:1, then plays and loses a game to Genoa 0:1 due to a penalty goal from Favilli, but wins a simulation against Manchester 3:1 with Paquetá and Jović scoring, making the semi-finals and fulfilling the club's objective for the Champions League this season.
text.summary2: (claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) In a Champions League season update, Adam's team advances to face Manchester City in the semi-finals after beating Napoli, then loses to Genoa 1-0 despite dominating play, but bounces back with a 3-1 win, meeting the club's objective of reaching the semi-finals.
text.summary3: (gpt4o) After overcoming Napoli in the Champions League quarter-finals, advancing to the semi-finals against Manchester City, Adam reflects on a frustrating loss to Genoa due to a controversial penalty, amidst routine victories, while highlighting the rotation in his squad and ongoing challenges in Serie A, remaining hopeful for future success in the Champions League.
text.summary4: (Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct) Adam's team advances to Champions League semi-finals against Manchester City after beating Genoa 3-1 in a simulated match.
text.summary5: (Qwen2.5-3B-Instruct; postedited) In the upcoming episode, Adam simulates matches to prepare for the upcoming Champions League semi-final against Manchester City, highlighting his team's struggles in previous games and focus on reaching the semifinals.
